department.en: Department of Biomedical Sciences and Engineering

goal.ch:
"-建立生醫光電專業知識與基本研究能力
-訓練建構生醫感測系統並提升實作能力
-培養發展自主思考與跨領域創新能力"
goal.en:
"-Be able to understand the fundamental knowledge of Biomedical Photonics and be able to have basic research skills
-Be able to construct Biomedical sensing system and the ability to implement the basic components of the system
-Be able to development self-learning skills and inter-disciplinary learning skills"

outline.ch:
"第01週 介紹
第02週 基礎光學
第03週 光與物質的交互作用
第04週 雷射原理與技術
第05週 生物成像原理與技術
第06週 螢光顯微鏡
第07週 掃描式顯微鏡
第08週 考試(I)
第09週 光譜與時間解析成像技術
第10週 光學相干斷層掃描
第11週 光學生物感測器
第12週 奈米技術於生醫光電應用
第13週 流式細胞儀
第14週 光動力療法於生醫應用
第15週 光鉗技術於生醫應用
第16週 實驗
第17週 實驗
第18週 考試(II)"
outline.en:
"Week 1 Introduction
Week 2 Fundamentals of Optics
Week 3 Fundamentals of Light-Matter Interactions
Week 4 Principles of Lasers and Current Laser Technology
Week 5 Bioimaging: Principles and Techniques
Week 6 Fluorescence Microscopy
Week 7 Scanning Microscopy
Week 8 Exam (I)
Week 9 Spectral and Time-resolved Imaging
Week 10 Optical Coherence Tomography
Week 11 Optical Biosensors
Week 12 Nanotechnology for Biophotonics
Week 13 Flow Cytometry
Week 14 Light-Activated Therapy: Photodynamic Therapy
Week 15 Laser Tweezers and Laser Scissors
Week 16 Experiment
Week 17 Experiment
Week 18 Exam (II)"

ch.competencies: 學習數物化、醫學、生物等科學基礎與精進知識、思辨邏輯及運用能力
執行實驗設計、數據分析與推論的能力
熟悉臨床醫學，並培養生醫器材或材料之設計、開發、及場域應用的能力
熟悉感測元件原理、訓練製造、設計與整合智慧系統
發掘、探究、解析、處理以及重構問題
培養多層面跨域整合與團隊合作
瞭解專業知識與人本倫理間的調和、以及技術對環境、社會之影響，並能持續學習

en.competencies: Learn the basics of mathematics, physics, chemistry, medicine, biology and their applications in healthcare
Ability to perform experimental design, data analysis and inference
Familiar with clinical medicine, and cultivate the ability of design, development, and field applications of biomedical devices or materials
Familiar with the principles of sensing elements, learn the ability to design, manufacture and integrate intelligent systems
The ability to discover, explore, analyze, process and reconstruct problems
Cultivate the ability of integrating multi-level cross-domain teamwork
Understand the reconciliation between professional knowledge and humanistic ethics, as well as the impact of technology on the environment and society, and the ability to continuous learning
